Blade_1.ShortDescription: All-in-one video bar for medium to large rooms
Blade_1.LongDescription: The premier video bar for medium to large meeting rooms. Discover remarkably simple, all-in-one video conferencing with built-in AI technology, brilliant optics, and powerful audio, with Rally Bar.

Blade_2.Headline: ALL-IN-ONE VIDEO BAR FOR MEDIUM AND LARGE ROOMS
Blade_2.Description: Discover a remarkably simple all-in-one video conferencing setup with brilliant optics, AI-based audio, remote management with Logitech Sync, and more.

Features.HeaderFeature: ENSURE EVERYONE IS SEEN AND HEARD
Features.KeyFeature: AI video intelligence, advanced sound pickup, noise suppression, and continuous software improvements provide a clear and natural meeting experience for remote workers.
Add a Sight tabletop companion camera or Rally Mic Pods to extend the audio pick up range and provide convenient access to mute controls.
Designed to deliver video meetings with ease, Rally Bar is quick to set up, simple to manage, and easy to integrate with meeting controllers such as Tap IP.

Easily manage all your spaces, from rooms to personal workspaces at scale, with Logitech Sync. Monitor room health, deploy updates, and modify settings all from a single cloud-based platform. And with Sync Insights, you can see how meeting spaces are utilized over time.

The plastic parts in the graphite version of Rally Bar include 40% certified post-consumer recycled plastic. We’re giving a second life to plastic from consumer electronics to help reduce our carbon footprint.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: All-in-one video bar for small to medium rooms
Blade_1.LongDescription: An all-in-one video bar for small to medium meeting rooms. Discover remarkably simple, all-in-one video conferencing with built-in AI technology, brilliant optics, and powerful audio.

Blade_2.Headline: ALL-IN-ONE VIDEO BAR FOR SMALL AND MEDIUM ROOMS
Blade_2.Description: Discover an exceptionally straightforward video conferencing solution featuring outstanding optics, AI-driven audio enhancements, seamless remote management through Logitech Sync, and additional advanced features.

Features.HeaderFeature: ENSURE EVERYONE IS SEEN AND HEARD
Features.KeyFeature: AI video intelligence, advanced sound pickup, noise suppression, and continuous software improvements provide a clear and natural meeting experience for remote workers.
Add up to three Rally Mic Pods to extend the audio pick up range and provide convenient access to mute controls.
Designed to deliver video meetings with ease, Rally Bar is quick to set up, simple to manage, and easy to integrate with meeting controllers such as Tap IP.

Easily manage all your spaces, from rooms to personal workspaces at scale, with Logitech Sync. Monitor room health, deploy updates, and modify settings all from a single cloud-based platform. And with Sync Insights, you can see how meeting spaces are utilized over time.

The plastic parts in the Graphite version of Rally Bar Mini include 36% certified post-consumer recycled plastic. We’re giving a second life to plastic from consumer electronics to help reduce our carbon footprint.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: All-in-one video bar for huddle and small rooms.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Featuring a sleek design and robust technology - Rally Bar Huddle is a straightforward and powerful solution for small spaces.

Blade_2.Headline: ALLURINGLY SIMPLE
Blade_2.Description: Featuring a sleek design and robust technology - Rally Bar Huddle is a straightforward and powerful solution for small spaces.

Features.KeyFeature: Ensure everyone can be seen and heard clearly during hybrid meetings. AI video intelligence, advanced sound pickup, noise suppression, and ongoing software improvements provide a clear and natural meeting experience for remote workers.
Use Rally Bar Huddle as a meeting room appliance, in USB mode connected to a meeting room PC, or connect via laptop.

Designed to deliver video meetings with ease, Rally Bar Huddle is quick to set up, simple to manage, and easy to integrate with Tap IP through CollabOS. Plus, use the included Multi Mount to mount Rally Bar Huddle one of three ways; on a wall, table, or above a display.

Easily manage all your spaces, from rooms to personal workspaces at scale, with Logitech Sync. Monitor room health, deploy updates, and modify settings all from a single cloud-based platform. And with Sync Insights, you can see how meeting spaces are utilized over time.
The plastic parts in Rally Bar Huddle are made with 42% post-consumer recycled plastic. We’re giving a second life to plastic from consumer electronics to help reduce our carbon footprint.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Make video meetings simple to join with a touch controller with wireless and HDMI content-sharing.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Transform your space into a Google Meet meeting place or a Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows with Logitech Tap. Deliver one-touch join, calendar integration, easy content-sharing, and a consistent experience across all rooms.

Blade_2.Headline: DEPLOY ROOM SOLUTIONS WITH EASE
Blade_2.Description: Transform your space into a Google Meet meeting place or a Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows with Logitech Tap. Deliver one-touch join, calendar integration, easy content-sharing, and a consistent experience across all rooms.

Features.KeyFeature: With a spacious 10.1” display, low profile, and motion sensor for always-on readiness, Tap has a sleek and unobtrusive presence in the room.
Route cables out the back or through the bottom. Keep connections tight with built-in strain relief and retention mechanisms.
Install Tap almost anywhere in the room with Table and Riser Mounts that fit standard grommets and rotate 180° for visibility and convenience, or save table space in small rooms with the Wall Mount.
Flexible cabling lets you locate Tap near participants for convenient operation while installing the host computer in a cabinet, beneath a table, or behind a display.
Bring instant content sharing via wireless or HDMI connections to video meetings rooms with Tap.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Make video meetings simple to join with a network-connected touch controller.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Transform collaboration spaces with Logitech Tap IP and leading video conferencing room solutions. Deliver one-touch join, easy content-sharing, and a seamless meeting experience across all rooms.

Blade_2.Headline: DEPLOY ROOM SOLUTIONS WITH EASE
Blade_2.Description: Transform collaboration spaces with Logitech Tap IP and leading video conferencing room solutions. Deliver one-touch join, easy content-sharing, and a seamless meeting experience across all rooms.

Features.KeyFeature: With a spacious 10.1” display, low profile, and motion sensor for always-on readiness, Tap IP has a sleek and unobtrusive presence in the room.
Streamline setup with a single cable that can be routed through the back or below the device. Keep connections tight with built-in strain relief and retention mechanisms.

Install Tap IP almost anywhere in the room with Table and Riser Mounts that fit standard table grommets and rotate 180° for visibility and convenience. Or save table space in small rooms with the Wall Mount.
With a single Power over Ethernet cable, place Tap IP conveniently near room participants for a tidy and professional install.
Provide a consistent one-touch join experience in rooms of virtually any size or shape

Features.HeaderFeature: SIMPLE TO MANAGE WITH LOGITECH SYNC
Features.KeyFeature: With Logitech Sync, you can monitor and manage Tap IP along with your other meeting room devices from one single platform.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Tabletop companion camera
Blade_1.LongDescription: Get the best perspective with Logitech Sight, which works as a companion with the front-of-room camera to deliver intelligent multi-participant framing.

Blade_2.Headline: TAKE A SEAT AT THE TABLE
Blade_2.Description: AI-powered meeting room camera that helps remote attendees feel like they’re actually seated at the table.

Features.KeyFeature: Add a tabletop perspective to your front-of-room camera to deliver a better, more inclusive hybrid meeting experience.

Sight seamlessly tracks, frames, and presents multiple active speakers in real-time, dynamically replacing and displaying individuals as they contribute to the conversation around the table. Meanwhile, the front-of-room camera overlays the front-of-room view of all in-room participants, providing a comprehensive and engaging view of the entire meeting

Features.HeaderFeature: SEE AND HEAR CLEARLY IN LARGER ROOMS
Features.KeyFeature: Sight is designed for medium to large rooms with 2.3m or 7.5 ft pickup range. It detects active speakers using 7 mics and uses 4K cameras and AI to clearly capture conversation and nonverbals.
Created for medium to large collaboration spaces, Sight extends the capabilities of the front-of-room camera to pick up on conversations and nonverbals around the room.

Features.HeaderFeature: CLEAR AUDIO. CLEAR VIDEO. CLEAR CONTROLS
Features.KeyFeature: With 4K cameras and 7 beamforming mics, Sight captures conversation and nonverbals clearly. Indicator lights and privacy shade allow for clear signaling and status control.
Easily install and secure Sight with the included mounts. Keep tables clean and cables plugged in with integrated cable management.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Purpose-built scheduling panel for meeting rooms
Blade_1.LongDescription: Make it easy to find and claim the right meeting space with Tap Scheduler, a purpose-built scheduling panel that’s designed for deployment at scale.

Blade_2.Headline: RIGHT PLACE, RIGHT TIME
Blade_2.Description: Tap Scheduler makes it easy to see meeting details and reserve a room for ad hoc or future meetings. Easily deploy as a purpose-built scheduling panel for leading room scheduling solutions to help workers find and claim the right space.

Features.KeyFeature: Quickly find an open room through colored LED lights that show availability at a distance.
Included mounts and clean cabling help ensure a tidy and professional setup.

Tap Scheduler was designed for easy viewing and usability, with a spacious screen and a sleek, unobtrusive profile. Count on Tap Scheduler for reliable performance with durable components that are built to last.

Features.HeaderFeature: MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR SPACE
Features.KeyFeature: Easily add Tap Scheduler to a variety of meeting rooms, from phone booths to video rooms to hangout nooks, helping employees quickly find the right meeting location. Simple installations and an intuitive user experience drive fast deployment and adoption.

Enable a seamless meeting experience through Tap Scheduler and Logitech’s suite of room solutions, which integrate with Microsoft Teams®, Zoom Rooms™, and other service providers to raise the bar on collaboration.*

Features.HeaderFeature: SIMPLE TO MANAGE WITH LOGITECH SYNC
Features.KeyFeature: With Logitech Sync, you can monitor and manage Tap Scheduler along with your other meeting room devices from one single platform.

Blade_1.LongDescription: Mounts Logitech Tap Scheduler at a comfortable angle for viewing.

Blade_2.Headline: DESIGNED FOR EASY BOOKING
Blade_2.Description: Ideal for lower height placements or angled viewing, Tap Scheduler Angle Mount offers more flexibility in how and where you place Tap Scheduler. The Angle Mount adds a 14º angle to the device’s mounting bracket, making it easier for people to read a room's meeting schedule.

Features.HeaderFeature: Glass Mounting/ Mullion Mounting/ Wall Mounting

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Premier modular video conferencing system for larger  rooms.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Discover integrated, simple, modular video conferencing with best-in-class optics and audio.

Blade_2.Headline: MODULAR VIDEO CONFERENCING SYSTEM FOR ALTERNATIVE SPACES
Blade_2.Description: Ensure everyone is seen and heard in every video call with Logitech Rally Plus. Rally Plus sets the standard for USB-connected conference camera systems in large rooms, uniting premium design and materials with unmatched audio and video performance.

Features.KeyFeature: Add up to 7 mic pods to accommodate larger groups and provide convenient access to mute controls.
When paired with Logitech RoomMate, Rally Plus unlocks AI video intelligence and continuous software improvements to provide a clear and natural meeting experience for remote workers.
Use Logitech Sync with Rally Plus when it is paired with RoomMate; monitor room and device health, deploy updates, and modify settings.
everage the video conferencing platforms and features you already use. Rally Plus is certified for leading video platforms like Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet*.

Features.HeaderFeature: ENSURE BUSINESS CONTINUITY WITH SELECT SERVICE PLAN
Features.KeyFeature: Remove barriers to collaboration and ensure conference rooms are ready for the next meeting. Select is a service plan beneficial for all room sizes and deployments. Optimize uptime with expert assistance within one hour, fast product replacements, and premium Sync functionality to proactively resolve issues before they impact your business.  With Select, we partner with you to reduce daily management, optimize performance, and help you maximize your investment.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Premium PTZ camera with Ultra-HD imaging system and automatic camera control
Blade_1.LongDescription: Conferencing camera with Ultra-HD imaging and automatic camera control

Blade_2.Headline: PEERLESS PERFORMANCE. EXCEPTIONAL VERSATILITY.
Blade_2.Description: With premium industrial design and an Ultra-HD imaging system, Rally Camera tops the lineup of standalone video cameras from Logitech®. Packed with advanced optics and breakthrough technologies, Rally Camera delivers premium performance in professional meeting spaces of all shapes and sizes. With whisper-quiet mechanical Pan/Tilt/Zoom, razor-sharp 15X HD zoom, expansive 90° diagonal field of view, and powerful 4K sensor, Rally Camera captures every person in the room with truly phenomenal video quality.

Features.KeyFeature: With an Ultra-HD imaging system, Rally Camera delivers brilliantly sharp video, outstanding color, and exceptional optical accuracy at resolutions up to 4K. Logitech RightLightTM technology optimizes light balance to emphasize faces and render natural-looking skin tones, even in dim or backlit conditions.

Rally Camera incorporates world-class Logitech optics and 4K sensor in a premium industrial design suitable for any professional setting. Elegantly finished in matte black with slate gray metal trim, Rally Camera can be positioned on a table, mounted on a tripod, or secured to a wall with included hardware. For overhead installations, the camera detects when it’s inverted and automatically corrects image orientation and camera controls.
Logitech RightSightTM camera control automatically moves and adjusts the lens to comfortably frame meeting participants in rooms of all shapes and sizes.

Logitech RightSense is a suite of proactive technologies built into Rally Camera that automate a better user experience. RightSight automates camera control to perfectly frame participants, no matter their distance from the lens. RightLight optimizes light balance and prioritizes faces over objects and surfaces to render natural-looking skin tones. Plus, Rally Camera is compatible with virtually any video conferencing app right out of the box.

When Rally Camera is not in use, the lens defaults to a parked position where the lens is pointed straight down. This provides visual affirmation that the camera is unable to “see” anything in the meeting space when idle. The lens lifts to a preset position when joining a meeting and parks automatically when the meeting ends. In addition, whenever video is muted during a meeting, a status light illuminates red to affirm visual privacy.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: CollabOS appliance for supported conference cameras and room solution peripherals

Blade_2.Headline: PURPOSE-BUILT FOR VIDEO COLLABORATION
Blade_2.Description: RoomMate runs CollabOS, which allows you to easily deploy Microsoft Teams® Rooms on Android™, Zoom Rooms™ Appliances, and other leading video conferencing services.

Features.KeyFeature: Connect the modular Rally System or MeetUp to RoomMate and add a Logitech Tap touch controller, Scribe whiteboard camera, and other collaboration devices to your meeting rooms to turn any space into an appliance-based video conferencing room.
In a sleek, low-profile form factor, RoomMate delivers all the power you need for HD video conferencing in rooms with one, two or three* displays.
Mount RoomMate securely and out of sight. The optional Compute Mount supports discreet installation and cable retention behind displays, inside cabinets, and on carts.

Broadcasting information across your physical workplace is even easier when you integrate Appspace with Logitech RoomMate for digital signage. Share visuals, important announcements, or other visuals in lobbies, hallways, meeting spaces, and more.

Easily manage your Logitech video collaboration devices with Logitech Sync. Monitor room health, deploy updates, and modify settings all from a single cloud-based platform. And with Sync Insights, you can see how meeting spaces are utilized over time.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: All-in-one USB conference camera for huddle and small rooms.
Blade_1.LongDescription: MeetUp 2 introduces intelligent, AI-driven experiences to USB-based deployments.

Blade_2.Headline: BRING INTELLIGENT EXPERIENCE TO USB AND BYOD SETUPS
Blade_2.Description: All-in-one conference camera that works with popular platforms and brings AI-based audio and video experiences to USB and BYOD deployments in small rooms.

Features.KeyFeature: Have the flexibility of deploying with an in-room compute or in BYOD mode.
Leverage the video conferencing platforms and features you already use. MeetUp 2 works with leading video platforms like Microsoft Teams, Zoom, and Google Meet.

Easily manage your MeetUp 2 and other Logitech video collaboration devices with Logitech Sync. Monitor room status, deploy updates, and modify settings all from a single cloud-based app. And with Sync Insights, you can see how meeting spaces are used over time.

Features.HeaderFeature: Flexible deployments with the Multi Mount
Features.KeyFeature: Multi mount enables an easy and flexible installation. Attach MeetUp 2 to a display, table, or wall to get the most out of your huddle and small spaces.

Features.HeaderFeature: Clean cabling and secure wire management
Features.KeyFeature: Ensure clean, confident installs with secure cable management and minimal cabling.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Enables single-cable BYOD connection for MeetUp 2.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Logitech Active USB Cable allows a single-cable connection between MeetUp 2 and laptops for BYOD meetings.

Blade_2.Headline: Join your meeting with the ease of a single cable connection
Blade_2.Description: Logitech Active USB Cable supports DisplayPort Alt Mode, which facilitates single-cable BYOD connection to a laptop.  Supporting super fast data transfers with USB 3.1 Gen 2 speeds, this 5m cable is long enough to provide better flexibility in small meeting rooms.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Whiteboard camera for video conferencing rooms
Blade_1.LongDescription: Effortlessly share whiteboards into video meetings with Logitech Scribe, an AI-powered whiteboard camera for Microsoft Teams Rooms, Zoom Rooms, Google Meet and other leading video conferencing services.

Blade_2.Headline: GET EVERYONE ON BOARD
Blade_2.Description: Effortlessly share whiteboards into video meetings with Logitech Scribe, an AI-powered whiteboard camera for Microsoft Teams® Rooms, Zoom Rooms™, Google Meet Rooms and other leading video conferencing services.

Features.HeaderFeature: PERFECT VIEWS, REMOTE OR IN THE ROOM
Features.KeyFeature: With built-in AI and a custom lens, Scribe broadcasts whiteboard content into video meetings with outstanding clarity. Now, even remote participants can have the best seat at the table.
Scribe’s wireless share button makes sharing whiteboards into video meetings quick and easy. You can also initiate sharing with your meeting room touch controller, like Logitech Tap.
Presenter Removal: Scribe’s built-in AI delivers a transparency effect, allowing participants to see “through” the presenter for an unobstructed view of the whiteboard.
Wall Mounting: Securely mount Scribe to a variety of wall surfaces with the included installation kit.
Scribe’s elegant, minimalist design complements any meeting space

Blade_1.ShortDescription: LAPTOP LINK FOR PC-BASED MEETING ROOMS
Blade_1.LongDescription: Connect a laptop to a room system’s AV equipment for use with PC-based video meetings.

Blade_2.Headline: ANY MEETING, EVERY ROOM
Blade_2.Description: With an innovative design that maximizes compatibility and incorporates DisplayLink® Plug-and-Display technology, Logitech Swytch offers a one-cable laptop link to a room’s conference camera and display, making it easy for teams to meet, present, and stream over any service.

Blade_1.LongDescription: Add another display to meeting rooms with simple setup and maintenance

Blade_2.Headline: Easily Connect Another Display
Blade_2.Description: Logitech USB-A to HDMI Adapter allows you to easily add another display to meeting rooms with Logitech conferencing cameras. Plug and play with DisplayLink technology for a reliable connection to common USB-A ports.

Features.KeyFeature: Enterprise-grade cable management and mounting options ensure an easy installation and minimize future problems.

​​The Logitech USB-A to HDMI Adapter supports HDMI CEC communication for automated power control between device and display. This feature is configured and enabled in Logitech Sync and used to save energy and extend the lifespan of your displays.
Manage all of your Logitech devices remotely with Logitech Sync, including USB-A  to HDMI Adapter. Know whether devices are connected and functional without physically inspecting every meeting room.

Blade_1.LongDescription: Second speaker connects to Logitech Rally for clear, rich sound

Blade_2.Headline: LOUD AND CLEAR
Blade_2.Description: Add a second speaker to Logitech Rally to fill large rooms with clear audio. With RightSound™ technologies that virtually eliminate distortion, clipping, and vibration, Rally Speaker makes speech easy to understand while maintaining comfortable volume levels throughout the room.

Features.KeyFeature: With Rally Speakers at the front of the room, voices and video always come from the same direction — and never from behind you, a problem with tabletop speakerphones. With Rally Mic Pods on the table and Rally Speakers at the display, conversations feel natural and lifelike.

An ingenious suspension system decouples the speaker module within the external enclosure, virtually eliminating the vibrations that can travel through walls, stands, and tables. This patent-pending design enables the superior echo cancelling performance of Rally Mic Pods, while ensuring that video images remain clear and steady, even at high volume levels and when zoomed in.

Turn up the clarity while keeping volume at a comfortable level for everyone in the room. With sound coming from two speakers rather than one, voices carry throughout the room at a moderate volume level. Place speakers on a shelf or credenza, or attach to the wall with brackets in the Rally Mounting Kit.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Modular microphones to extend coverage
Blade_1.LongDescription: Microphones with RightSound for Rally, Rally Bar, and Rally Bar Mini

Blade_2.Headline: GOOD LOOKS MEET GREAT SOUND
Blade_2.Description: Boasting a sleek, low-profile design and premium materials, these mic pods render clear, natural, conversational sound. Individual pods contain multiple beamforming elements to capture speech, not distractions. In larger rooms, deploy additional mic pods to extend the beamforming mic matrix throughout the room.

Features.KeyFeature: While ordinary microphones pick up any sound, these mic pods hear voices. With RightSound™ technologies to auto-level voices, suppress noise, and cancel echo, conversations feel remarkably lively and natural.

Mic pods can be daisy-chained for full coverage in rooms with long tables. For U-shaped tables or single-wire cabling through grommets, the Rally Mic Pod Hub accessory provides three connections for optimal positioning and to bring mute control within easy reach.

Thanks to the union of advanced technology and robust build quality, Rally Mic Pods deliver both remarkable range and exquisite sensitivity. Thoughtful materials resist fingerprints and stains, while a color-coded LED icon provides clear visual confirmation when muted.

Elevate the appearance of meeting rooms with the available Mic Pod Mount. The compact form factor and clever design details anchor mic pods to both tables and ceilings, and hides cabling for a clean look.

Blade_1.LongDescription: Anchor Rally Mic Pod to a table or ceiling, with cable management for a clean installation.

Blade_2.Headline: MIC POD MOUNT
Blade_2.Description: Elevate the appearance of meeting rooms equipped with Rally Mic Pods. With a compact form factor and clever design, Mic Pod Mount anchors mic pods in place, provides a hidden path for cabling, and neatly coils excess cable.

Features.KeyFeature: Say goodbye to visible cables and wandering mic pods. Mic Pod Mount gives meeting rooms a finished look while making sure that mic pods stay connected, meeting after meeting.
Mic Pod Mount anchors mics and routes cables through grommet holes from 25 - 65 mm in diameter, and adjusts to tables up to 50 mm thick.
Equally at home on the ceiling, Mic Pod Mount offers ultimate flexibility for multipurpose rooms, classrooms, and other reconfigurable spaces.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Ceiling pendant mount for Rally Mic Pods.

Blade_2.Headline: CONVERSATIONS WITHIN REACH
Blade_2.Description: Mic Pod Pendant Mount allows you to hang Rally Mic Pods in rooms that have tall ceiling rooms and tables that can’t have mics attached or that have unique setups. Hanging mics from the ceiling helps ensure everyone can be heard equally even in your largest spaces.

Features.KeyFeature: Mic Pod Pendant Mount easily secures the mic pods to both drop ceilings and solid ceilings.
Regardless of placement and configuration, the following accessories are highly recommended when using Mic Pod Pendant Mount.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Extend Mic Pods with CAT Coupler
Blade_1.LongDescription: Extend the length of Rally Mic Pod cables by connecting Rally Mic Pod CAT Coupler to a standard CAT cable.

Blade_2.Headline: USE YOUR OWN CABLE AT YOUR DESIRED LENGTH. IT’S THAT EASY.
Blade_2.Description: When deploying Rally Mic Pods and Mic Pod Hubs, you may find yourself needing a little more cable, or a lot more cable. Easily extend the connection by using the Rally Mic Pod CAT Coupler to connect to a standard CAT cable.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: 10 meter extension cable
Blade_1.LongDescription: Extend connections of multiple Rally Mic Pods using plenum-rated cabling

Features.KeyFeature: Rally Mic Pod Extension Cable adds 10 meters of additional reach to the cabling of Rally Mic Pod or Rally Mic Pod Hub, and is plenum-rated and ECA certified for commercial installation in walls, above ceilings, through raceways, and within standard 19mm conduit.
When used with Rally Bar and Rally Bar Mini, two cables can connect for a total extension of 20 meters.

Features.HeaderFeature: FROM TABLE HUB TO TABLE’S END
Features.KeyFeature: In rooms with Rally or Rally Plus, connect Rally Mic Pod Extension Cable directly  to the table hub to accommodate larger tables.
Rally Mic Pod Extension Cable comes with a cable clip to keep your connections tight and secure.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: FOR LOGITECH ROOMMATE AND MINI PCs
Blade_1.LongDescription: Mounting bracket with cable retention for Logitech RoomMate and other compute solutions.

Blade_2.Headline: A CLEAN AND SECURE MOUNTING OPTION
Blade_2.Description: Securely mount your compute device out of sight and out of harm’s way. Designed for discreet installation behind displays, inside cabinets, or on carts, Compute Mount is a great fit for any video conferencing space — and perfect for Logitech RoomMate, Google Meet compute system, Intel NUC, and other video conferencing compute devices.

Features.HeaderFeature: FITS ROOMMATE AND OTHER SSF COMPUTES
Features.KeyFeature: Robust steel mount fits Logitech RoomMate and other compatible small form factor compute devices using the standard 2.9 in (75 mm) or 3.9 in (100 mm) VESA mounting patterns.

Cable retention clamp relieves cable strain and keeps connections tight and secure, including USB, HDMI, power, and network cables. Compatible with a 100x100 or 75x75 VESA pattern. The two-piece clamp is elevated for greater flexibility and less strain.
Compute Mount includes hardware to discreetly mount RoomMate or other compatible compute devices out of sight and out of harm’s way.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Secure the Tap controller to the table for a tidy setup
Blade_1.LongDescription: Swiveling table mount with cable management for Logitech Tap and Tap IP meeting room controllers.

Blade_2.Headline: LOGITECH TAP TABLE MOUNT
Blade_2.Description: Designed for conference room tables with grommet holes, the Table Mount secures the touch controller in place while maintaining a low profile. Tap Table Mount maintains a clean tabletop by routing cables through the grommet hole, and swivels 180° for convenient operation from both sides of the table.

Features.KeyFeature: Preserves the touch controller’s sleek appearance and 14° screen angle while swiveling 180° for viewing and operation from multiple seats.
Adjusts to tables up to 50mm (2 in) in thickness, and through grommet holes from 51 - 89mm (2 - 3.5 in) in diameter.
Supports down-routing of cables through the grommet hole for a clean appearance.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Raise the Tap controller for better visibility
Blade_1.LongDescription: Elevated table mount with swivel and cable management for Logitech Tap and Tap IP meeting room touch controllers.

Blade_2.Headline: LOGITECH TAP RISER MOUNT
Blade_2.Description: Designed for conference room tables with center-located grommet holes, the Riser Mount secures the touch controller in place and elevates the display angle to 30° for better visibility and easier operation while seated. Tap Riser Mount maintains a clean tabletop by routing cables through the grommet hole, and swivels 180° for convenient operation from both sides of the table.

Features.HeaderFeature: RAISED PROFILE FOR AN EASIER REACH
Features.KeyFeature: Elevates the touch controller to a 30° display angle and swivels 180° for easier operation when reaching a center-of-table mounting location.
Adjusts to tables up to 50mm in thickness, and through grommet holes from 2.0 - 3.5 in (51 - 89mm) in diameter.
Supports down-routing of cables through the grommet hole for a clean appearance.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Mount Tap controllers to the wall to save table space
Blade_1.LongDescription: Wall mount with cable management for Logitech Tap and Tap IP meeting room touch controllers.

Blade_2.Headline: LOGITECH TAP WALL MOUNT
Blade_2.Description: Designed to conserve table space in huddle rooms and for stand-up operation in hallways and open areas, the Logitech Tap Wall Mount offers convenient access to touch controls. A magnetic cable dock neatly holds an HDMI cable for wired content sharing.

Features.KeyFeature: The sturdy plate and cleat construction holds the controller securely in place and adds virtually no thickness for a sleek appearance.
When using Tap with applications that support wired content sharing, a magnetic cable clip and dock keep an HDMI cable within reach but out of the way.
Compatible with the touch controller’s rear and bottom cable exits so you can route cabling either within or down the wall.

Blade_1.LongDescription: Customize microphone placement for most any conference table configuration

Blade_2.Headline: YOUR CONFERENCE ROOM. YOUR WAY.
Blade_2.Description: Rally Mic Pod Hubs provide installers with the flexibility to customize microphone placement on virtually any conference table. An alternative to daisy-chaining mic pods to one another, Rally Mic Pod Hub provides three connections that support any combination of mic pods or additional hubs. Under-table mounting hardware helps conceal cables for a clean look.

Features.KeyFeature: Eliminate the back-and-forth cabling on U-shaped or asymmetrical conference tables and add placement flexibility. With three connections for an array of mic pods, Rally Mic Pod Hub cleans up cabling so you can place mic pods within easy reach of meeting room participants.
Eliminate cross-table cabling between mic pods by connecting them through grommets to hubs beneath the table. This keeps audio cabling out of sight for a professional appearance.

Rally Mic Pod Hub lets you connect each mic pod via a single cable. When meeting participants want to move a mic pod to clear table space or to put the mute control within easy reach, they can do so without tugging on neighboring mic pods. Unlike systems that require fixed mic positions, Rally automatically recalibrates the RightSound™ Mic Matrix 125 times per second for consistent echo cancellation, noise suppression, and beamforming performance.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: VESA-compatible mounting kit for Rally Bar and Rally Bar Mini.

Features.KeyFeature: Position Rally Bar and Rally Bar Mini below the display for natural eye contact. Mounting directly to the wall saves space and lends to a finished appearance to any room.
In rooms where above-display mounting makes sense, the 10° tilt down adapter delivers a room-wide view with the right angle for video meetings.
Engineered for perfectionists. The built-in angle adjustment lets you precisely align the level of your video bar with the display.
The Wall Mount works with your video bar’s built-in cable retention cover, so cables can run up, down, or both and stay securely connected
With industry-standard VESA mounting pattern (200x50mm), Wall mount is equally at home on mobile carts for ultimate versatility.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: For Logitech video bars
Blade_1.LongDescription: Attach Rally Bar, Rally Bar Mini, or Rally Camera to almost any display with VESA mounting points.

Blade_2.Headline: FLOATS BELOW DISPLAY
Blade_2.Description: Save space and clear the credenza by floating Rally Bar, Rally Bar Mini, or Rally camera below the display.

Features.KeyFeature: In rooms where above-display mounting makes sense, the 10°video bar tilt down adaptor delivers a room-wide view with the right angle for video meetings.
Engineered for perfectionists. The built-in angle adjustment lets you precisely align the level of your video bar with the display.
Adjust mounting depth by up to 50mm to fit a wide range of display thicknesses and wall standoffs.
With a versatile swing-arm design and industry standard VESA compatibility, TV Mount for Video Bars works with wall- and cart-mounted displays up to  248.92 cm in size (measured diagonally).
Whether mounted above the display or below, thoughtful routing keeps cables securely connected and out of sight.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Custom mounts for a sleek installation and secure cabling
Blade_1.LongDescription: Cleanly install and secure cabling for Rally Plus system with included brackets and mounting hardware

Blade_2.Headline: A SLEEK, SECURE, FLEXIBLE MOUNTING SYSTEM
Blade_2.Description: Achieve a streamlined installation of each Rally Plus component with included brackets and mounting hardware. Camera bracket provides a secure, stable wall mount above or below the display, or cleverly inverts for near-ceiling installations. Mount speakers directly to the wall with low-profile brackets. Position hubs on a wall or beneath a table with ventilated hardware, then secure connections with the cable retention brackets for a professional appearance.

Features.KeyFeature: The camera bracket provides flexibility to mount the camera on a wall directly above or below the display for a natural line of sight and eye contact with remote participants. For larger meeting spaces, the bracket can be inverted to position the camera near the ceiling for a more expansive view. A tripod screw and three-point pin system provides stability and helps keep the camera steady when the lens is in motion.

Each accessory in the Rally Mounting Kit is tailored to the system component it supports. The two brackets that mount the Rally speakers on either side of the display create a sleek “floating” appearance while enabling the speakers themselves to deliver their full acoustic potential. The result: lifelike conversational sound that helps bring people together even as the enabling technology fades unobtrusively into the background.

Features.HeaderFeature: VENTILATED BRACKETS FOR DISPLAY HUB AND TABLE HUB
Features.KeyFeature: Two ventilated hub brackets provide versatile mounting options to position the Display Hub and Table Hub on a wall or beneath a table. The brackets are engineered with elevated standoffs to ensure ample air circulation for reliable cooling.

Guard against accidental disconnections and related trouble tickets while keeping cables neat and tidy.  Each two-piece bracket mounts near the Display Hub and Table Hub to keep the power, A/V, and data cables securely plugged in.

Blade_1.ShortDescription: Choose a mini PC from a variety of partners.
Blade_1.LongDescription: Run the videoconferencing directly from the in-room PC, alongside Logitech’s conferencing cameras and extensions. Contact your reseller for more info.
